base_description: Black, rectangular eyeglasses with a modern design.
part_description: Two lenses, connected by a bridge, with two arms extending from the frame. The lenses are rectangular, and the arms are straight, attached at the corners of the frame.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are secured within the frame, held by the bridge and arms. The bridge connects the two lenses, providing structural support. The arms hinge at the frame, allowing them to fold inward for compact storage.
external_interaction_description: The eyeglasses are worn on the face, resting on the nose and ears. They improve vision by correcting refractive errors and can be adjusted to fit different head sizes. They may interact with cases for protection when not in use.
